amendment.description: Amendment includes administrators of adult education and literacy activities on local Workforce Investment Boards.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 108-92 to eliminate the inclusion of an adult education representative on local Workforce Investment Boards.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Allen amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Allen.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Allen amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
